title: The Call to Choose Life
summary: Deuteronomy 30 offers hope of restoration even after disobedienceâ€”if Israel returns to God, He will bless them again. Moses urges the people to choose life by loving and obeying God.

faq.question: What does Moses urge the people to choose?
faq.answer: Life and blessing by loving the Lord and walking in His ways.

faq.question: Is restoration possible after failure?
faq.answer: Yes, if the people repent, God promises to restore their fortunes and bless them again.
